website_summaries.verdict: This choice is best for the home game room rather than serious dart play or practice.
pros: Allows kids or adults to practice their aim on a full-size dartboard
Accommodates up to 4 players and has 90 game variations
The darts are light but hold up to repeated play with only tip replacements needed
cons: Plastic construction is thin and feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 4 boards for our weekly dart league ( ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 boards for our weekly dart league ( 10 games a week ), after 2 weeks the boards started to not keep score correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!! I ordered this dart board because it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied!! I ordered this dart board because it plugs in. Well, seems they forgot to pack the power cord. It is Clearly listed in the Manuel.
customer_reviews.author: JennFilyawYork

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this dartboard
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's functional but the darts don't stick half the time so you're constantly having to pick them up off the ground. This adds up over the course of a few games. Also, the package ships as "signature required" -- this is odd for a $12.75 dartboard. This led to a delayed delivery and us not having this when we really needed it. You can find much better dartboards in the $25 range which is still cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H. Easter

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It’s not even worth a 1 star it quit working right after I through my first 3 darts, Do not buy this it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyJoan

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, there are a few areas on the board ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there are a few areas on the board that don't work:(. It won't sound if the dart lands in different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The plastic darts are junk. All six darts broke in 30 minuets of normal play.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Crap total crap
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Waste of money never worked great and lasted about a month. Its complete crap and shouldn't even be sold. Now iv got darts and play every day but now I cant. Its BS
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: The display may be prominent but it is also in the direct line of fire with no protection from errant darts
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok until some people that wasn't skilled in throwing darts came to play and then the weakness of this product came out. When the unskilled people began to throw without any guidance, they ended up hitting the scoring display and cracking it. They cracked it so bad that the display was not legible. I can not find parts to replace the display on the game either. It was fun to me while it lasted all of 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A. Brathwaite

customer_reviews.title: skip this one
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is horrible. I mean, the electronic aspect is okay, but we have spent a lot of money on darts and still have not found a set that will stick to the board. The best we can get is the board to pick up the hit and record it, but it is inaccurate. The darts just fall on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: So unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I got to use it twice and it will not work now. It freezes up. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jnorton

customer_reviews.title: Piece Of Crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February & here it is only may & we've used the dart board maybe three times & it's already messing up! We throw a dart & no matter where it hits the board it automatically says bullseye & I can't return it because I've had it more than a month! I rate it no stars but didn't give me that option!
customer_reviews.author: Bill &.

customer_reviews.title: Franklin Sports FS6000  Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: The Dartboard is not to bad for the Price $35. It seems to have a nice amount of games to play. The darts that come with the unit are Junk and need to be thrown away as the tips strip out very easy after a few throws at the board. The Dart board seems to be good quality but my daughter has a hard time getting the darts to stick she has a lot of bounce outs. Again for the Price its a good unit so far. I like that its the large 15" board with a lot of games to play.
customer_reviews.author: Patton Financial

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This dart board was a perfect gift for my husband. He had a cork board already, but wanted something with games that he could play against a computer and it would keep track of his score. This one was perfect, because it had all the bar games he loved to play! The only downside is the darts it comes with are a little flimsy and light, and other darts are too big for the holes it has. We’ve been able to improvise. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: esanchez

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it more for children use
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is more for kids. It's not regulation size and so it's a bit small. I would recommend it more for children use.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Bar Tips won’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during the pandemic so that I can keep practicing for our bar nights with friends... this thing is junk, only the tips provided on the flimsy included darts will stick. Tried 3 different varieties on my “professional” darts and maybe stick 1 in 5 throws. The basic electronics are good, just wanted a better practice experience. I guess this might be ok for kids?
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bersagel

customer_reviews.title: Good for young beginners
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, smaller than expected, can’t turn off or down the loud automated voice. The darts that came with are super light weight. Bought the next weight up closest to the darts included but they wouldn’t even stick in the board. Would make a good starter board for kids interested in learning how to play. But for adults who like to play at home.. it would not be the best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jess E.

customer_reviews.title: The second one works fine, but it's very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: First one was DOA. They replaced it quickly without question. The second one works fine, but it's very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saved us during the pandemic!!! Way more fun than the cork ones, not that I’m old enough to have ever played with a cork one.....🤔
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Fun starter set....easy install, but disappointed it only came with three of the six dart tips
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good starter set, I purchased it for the kids after they graduated from a kids set. Luckily I also purchased another set of darts because it only came with three of the six dart tips. But sadly I won’t have them for another couple days. Install was easy. It comes with 3 screws and 3 drywall anchors. Game functions work fine but I just noticed the cabinet doors don’t fully close with the darts that were sent with the set (the dart fins are fixed hard plastic and do not collapse, with another set I think they may close). But like I said it’s for my kids so to me it really doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I bought this bc we needed something to do while in quarantine for COVID. This was the perfect thing to keep us entertained for hours. For the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas for my 6 year old, he loves it. When we first opened it, we were disappointed that the darts were missing. I emailed customer service and they had them shipped to me in two days! Very happy with this product, I was a little worried because of other reviews but we have no problem with darts sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.  Quality control isnt great.
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived DOA. Second one works great. A bit light so it bounces on the wall a bit but great for the price paid. I dont experience the issues with bounce outside that many complain of.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: The center bull’s-eye broke the first bull’s-eye I threw and it is not the original size of a true dartboard
customer_reviews.author: kevin gish

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The dartboard seems nice I have to buy batteries to put inside of it but it did not come with all the parts for me to put my darts together which is a big bummer cuz now I can't play this game without darts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never played on it
customer_reviews.text: The only star I give this is because I received it quickly. I mounted it to the wall plugged it in, all the lights came on thought it was working. Came back a week later, no lights and it doesn''t work. Unfortunately I threw the box away or I would return it. I very seldom ever give a negative review, but I am on this one.
customer_reviews.author: sherri shafar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, incredibly cheap
customer_reviews.text: This dart board only counts about half the the darts that end up on the board. So it doesn’t keep an accurate score. The whole idea of an electric board is that it keeps score. Also the audio is terrible and darts incredibly cheap. I understand you get what you pay for but this was not worth even the low price. It is not worth the effort of returning it so it will get donated or tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe your money
customer_reviews.text: Safe your money. We used like 4 times and it kept turning off and on. It's really cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: TONS of games on here. Well worth the money. Although the bullseye on mine gets stuck sometimes and will register as bull/double bull even when I’m not close to hitting it. Has only happened twice but still a flaw that could checked out.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Manring

customer_reviews.title: This has been a good dart board and I like the features
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good dart board and I like the features. Very little bounce out. I like the voice feature. It has now been about 8 months that I have had this dart board. Still works great!
customer_reviews.author: frankly99150

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Power cord was not in the box so I sent Franklin a message they sent me a power adapter. Finnaly got it a week later plugged it in didn't work. Just junk a waist of 50 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked correctly. Would have been great.
customer_reviews.text: Our dart board after 2 uses has a malfunction. 2 Numbers don’t work, 1 number gives incorrect point. We have had this less than one week. Although this is fun for our family, we are very disappointed in our device especially for what we spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: When the darts don't stick just a random number will be used exp. Bounced off 20 but say 4
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cage

customer_reviews.title: Never got past the start up screen
customer_reviews.text: This board was built just fine but I may have got a faulty product because it never worked from day one. After installing it my kids got ahold of it and I don’t think I can return it anymore as I also threw away the box
customer_reviews.author: SemajNagrom

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty weak. I know that it's not made for kids but mine was broken by a very softly lofted dart and it just shattered the LCD in the back. I have an arachnid that i picked up at a garage sale and it's taken a lickin and still tickin. I was pretty disappointed this didn't last but two days.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Love to play darts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present for my son who loves to play darts and it is a great dark game for the money
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased as family Christmas gift. Didn't have a chance to put it up until March. We put it up and went to play and only 3 numbers on the board worked. Tried everything and read through the manual and still no luck. By waiting missed opportunity to return. Called them tomorrow ro see if they are willing to do anything about this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Tons of family fun
customer_reviews.text: Approved by 13, 16, 18 and 20 year. Hours of fun and so many game options.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn M. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the product matched the description. Batteries can't be used on this board since the ac adapter did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good for what you pay for it but tends to loose thrown darts
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Meade

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works just fine, I purchased the plastic darts to avoid holes in wall but still went thru. Other than that it's perfect for my kids. Parts are sturdy good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Acosta

customer_reviews.title: broken after 2 months light use
customer_reviews.text: some area on the dartboard did not respond to dart, no sound, no score. Contacted manufacturer, only voice mail. I left them VM, no one contact me to follow up. Bad product. Try to avoid it
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L

customer_reviews.title: I do not like it. At all
customer_reviews.text: I play often while out with friends and bought this to practice with at home. I do not like it. At all. Even the darts that came with the board hardly stick. Some of the numbers randomly decide not to register points.. Beyond frustrating. This now belongs to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works great !
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price.. My boys its perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy read this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing ever made.... Darts don't even stick on the board no matter how u throw it. Horrible quality. Those darts started breaking apart right after opening it. It's mostly my Gould I didn't even read the reviews just bought it and I regret it big time. I'm going to return this garbage...
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Borken Darts
customer_reviews.text: All darts were broken for only several days usages. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Angel

customer_reviews.title: i recommend this dartboard.
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy this dartboard. I have had it before. Lots of fun for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: rod ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Love this dart board though I wish it would come ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this dart board though I wish it would come with extra parts to hold the dart flag on top. Sometimes after long uses those pieces can get broken and there are not extra pieces to replace. Hasnt happened yet but wish it would come with those extra tops just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take batteries, DOA
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take batteries as pictured, and unit was DOA, returned and purchased different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This dart board doesn’t even work and is very flimsy. I would not recommend this to anyone. It doesn’t look like it is thin and fragile in the pictures but it is
customer_reviews.author: Beth Beth

customer_reviews.title: Dart 🐗
customer_reviews.text: Was what I expected but the darts fall apart Easley
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High bounce out rate
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a cheap dartboard but I was expecting a bit more. As is, the bounce out rate is 50-60%. I would say this dartboard is pretty much unusable.
customer_reviews.author: pitor82

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts...
customer_reviews.text: The product came without darts, and without the powercord. I have reached out to Franklin's product support via email and have not received a response. I tried calling but due to CO-VID19 they are closed and I was told to email product support...really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good value for money. good amount of games to choose from. came with cheap bar darts, but the board is good!
customer_reviews.author: Eric siegmeier

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for its price. My 9 yr old son had it in his room :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered on time. Price was reasonable. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time. Price was reasonable. Wasn't' thrilled the box wasn't taped it had one of the tabs ripped, it could have came open at any time during shipping. It is already wore out and not working properly. Overally for the price can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: cathi

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: dart board came in box, no packing, no instructions, no darts. nothing. just a plastic dartboard. but my kids were so excited and waited for it i went and purchased soft tip darts for them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingB

customer_reviews.title: they just wont register anything so like the 5 we just walk over and hit the ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. Some of the areas don't work, they just wont register anything so like the 5 we just walk over and hit the 4 which is kinda lame if you are serious about the game, but the kids can use it for some entertainment. Next one I will put more money into to get something that will work better. Otherwise I like all the game choices of being single player.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie mejia

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described other then I wish their was extra darts. We broke one of them pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Conservmom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: We got this board May 14th. We only play on the weekends. It died completely on July 27th!! For the money I spent, it should have lasted more than 2 months! Grr
customer_reviews.author: sheri T

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: It was fun but the voice was staticky and the score screen went out just 6 weeks after purchase.. cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Sdray6978

customer_reviews.title: Darts don't stick.
customer_reviews.text: Useless, unless you want the exercise of picking darts off of the floor since they didn't stick and fell.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the 20 bucks for sure
customer_reviews.text: Some spots on the board get stuck in, and you have to stick a dart in there and pull up to get them unstuck or it will give you a false score.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Briana

customer_reviews.title: Not regular size
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small. The darts are small and the numbers are small. It’s cool about 8 player scoring. The first night we played 301 with 4 players. It wasn’t what I was expecting and I’m pretty disappointed with it
customer_reviews.author: Lee Bushen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Great dartboard for the price, however, two of the flights "teeth holders" broke within the first week. Otherwise, the family is loving another activity to do in the evenings. Easy to install correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cravatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. Darts a little weak and will eventually need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabella

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: very bad quality not good arrows not good and doesn't give you good result every time mistakes not good for money
customer_reviews.author: Salah Elsayed Salah Eldin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great comes with extra tips just in case....good buy
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Garbage... don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! I bought this dartboard on March 27th and it's already broken I've used it about 20 times don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: craig jagaczewski

customer_reviews.title: Frequently bought
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the staff to use on breaks. the boardnos great. They are really enjoying it. Beware tho..the "frequently bought with" darts are 18 gems. They are too heavy and bounce out. Go lighter
customer_reviews.author: Jo Kuk

customer_reviews.title: seller isn't reliable
customer_reviews.text: Box came and it had clearly been taped back together. There weren't even any darts in the box (or replacement tips). Amazing job sending a dart board without darts.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Jazzi Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Hot hit at the parties
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for a one time use at a holiday party and have been playing it since. It has held up well to continued use
customer_reviews.author: Tim Herringshaw

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is fun for our family. The price was very good and there are a ton of different games to play and it has sounds and electronic scoring. We are hardly dart enthusiasts, but for family fun, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The reviews made me think it wasn’t as durable, but it’s a great board and sturdy! Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: User interface lol

customer_reviews.title: Missing power cord
customer_reviews.text: I received the dartboard and went to install it. There is no power adapter in my box. Kinda hard to play electronic darts with no power
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Darts ALWAYS bounce out
customer_reviews.text: The dart board has nice features and is easy to figure out the different games. The darts bounce out 90% of the time. Drives me crazy. Definitely wouldn’t buy this dart board again.
customer_reviews.author: Loren T.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: saw several reviews below 2 stars, hesitated to buy this one. Anyway bought this, but working quite well so far and worthwhile to pay the posted price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyu Nam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: purchased for something to do during the pandemic, great entertainment during the lockdown
customer_reviews.author: snookers

customer_reviews.title: It could be better than this.
customer_reviews.text: While it was cool to play, it didn't last long. The flight (feathers) kept falling off from day 1 and it quickly became annoying. The scoring system works fine. It's an OK introduction to the dart game for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Elman

customer_reviews.title: COOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am EXTREMELY satisfied with this dartboard its AWESOME i love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginners! Easy to mount and play. For the price this is being offered, it’s not a bad deal!
customer_reviews.author: Pawan

customer_reviews.title: Bullseye
customer_reviews.text: worth the money, glad I finally bought it..I wish it came with more replacement darts and/or dart parts...other than that ...no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The display didn't work so I sent it back to ...
customer_reviews.text: The display didn't work so I sent it back to get a replacement, and the replacement's display didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Unable to hear the audio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dart board, the only issue I have with it is that you can hardly hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun for price
customer_reviews.text: hour of fun. Lots of different games can play against the computer. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: A great dartboard for a beginner child!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for young kids, but have to have a strong arm to get them to stick well.
customer_reviews.author: appalacia

customer_reviews.title: No power supply
customer_reviews.text: Waited for this board to come in, delivered today and there is no power cord! Poor sales. This item will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Easy to set and fun to play
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The fletching was broken as soon as my son opened it for his birthday. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: hsalada24

customer_reviews.title: Tips break
customer_reviews.text: Good board BUT dart tips break! Went to Walmart and got soft tips! Works great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks of usage
customer_reviews.text: The bullseye on this product stopped working after less than 2 weeks of use. I will be trying to get a refund on this item.
customer_reviews.author: eah

customer_reviews.title: Below average
customer_reviews.text: Received my order. But it’s missing the blue dart tips...called support and they’re closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackelin T Phan

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I’m missing one of the metal dart pieces? How can I get one?
customer_reviews.author: Kari M Fenimore

customer_reviews.title: Not working straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and the voice and displays just repeatedly stuttered and blinked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Keller

customer_reviews.title: Our Kids Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our kiddos. They wanted to play darts soooo.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Low quality dart tips. Needs to come with more replacement tips
customer_reviews.text: Great game but the dart tips were broken the 1st day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Games!
customer_reviews.text: Has lots of games, easy to put up, only thing that I would change is different darts. Other than that, great board!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Worst dart board ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have competed in darts for over 40 years and I have to say this is the worst dart board ever. The darts constantly bounce of the board. One in ten tries maybe will stay on the board. The digital display has sounds but doesn't show any read outs. You can't set it for any game and it doesn't show any scores. This board doesn't even qualify to be a cheap child's toy. Do not waste your money on this one. I bought it for its small size so to put into my RV for a travel game. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for hubby and the boys!
customer_reviews.text: We love our board!! It’s been such a delight during this quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: can't see the score
customer_reviews.text: You can't see the bottom row showing the score. Both lines should be red. The green is useless. I actually bought 2 different ones thinking the first one was broke. Other than that it probably would have been great . I loved how loud the volume was.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Electronic Dartboards, Soft Tip, LCD Digital Scoring, 6 Brass Plated Darts
feature_bullets: Includes 6 soft tip darts and 6 BONUS replacement tips
